definitions.title: n.f.
definitions.body: young shoot, twig (= foregoing)—[[יוֹנַקְתּוֹ]] Job 8:16 + 2 t.; [[יוֹנְקוֹתָיו]] Ho 14:7; [[יׁנְקוֹתָיו]] Ez Eze 17:22; [[יוֹנְקוֹתֶיהָ]] Ps 80:12; —shoot, twig, of tree Job 14:7; cf wicked under fig. of tree Job 8:16, Job 15:30; Israel under fig. of olive-tree Ho 14:7, of cedar Ez Eze 17:22, of vine Ps 80:12.
